section:
You walk down into pitch darkness. The scent is of damp loam and ozone. Sorcery is in the very air here, strong enough to make your skin tingle. To master the winding paths below the world you must
make a MAGIC or SCOUTING roll
(your choice) at a Difficulty of 17.
[If you’re missing book 12, don’t say you weren’t warned - .]
